Yes, they must be Brazilian then, from  a sub site.
Often I see the same subs uploaded as Br and Pt as well then I get pissed not knowing which is it.
But in most of my new torrents I do say if it is Port Br...All of you should leave comments at the subtitles-sites saying what sub it is, Br or Pt, spa Cast or spa Lat Am...
Some blu-rays don't say it either if it is Latin Spa or Pt.
Finally you learned some new Brazilian expressions, good for you ;-)
